basic.title: Basic Track
basic.subtitle: Foundation in AI and Programming
basic.description: Build a strong foundation in AI concepts, programming fundamentals, and logical thinking. This comprehensive track is designed for beginners with no prior programming experience, guiding you through the essentials of artificial intelligence and Python programming.

tracks.name: Track 1: Introduction to AI
tracks.description: Discover the fundamentals of artificial intelligence and its real-world applications
topics: What is AI and Machine Learning?

tracks.name: Track 2: Programming Fundamentals
tracks.description: Master Python programming and essential data structures for AI development

tracks.name: Track 3: Machine Learning Basics
tracks.description: Apply your skills to build your first machine learning projects
topics: Capstone Project: Build an AI Application

application.title: Application Track
application.subtitle: Real-World AI Applications
application.description: Apply AI techniques to solve real-world problems and develop practical solutions. This intermediate track builds on foundational knowledge to create production-ready AI applications using modern frameworks and tools.

tracks.name: Track 1: Advanced Machine Learning
tracks.description: Deep dive into advanced ML algorithms and techniques

tracks.name: Track 2: Deep Learning & Computer Vision
tracks.description: Master neural networks and visual AI applications

tracks.name: Track 3: NLP & Production Deployment
tracks.description: Build and deploy complete AI applications

robot.title: Robot Track
robot.subtitle: Intelligent Robotics Systems
robot.description: Design, build, and program intelligent robotic systems from scratch. This advanced track combines AI, hardware engineering, and control systems to create autonomous robots capable of perceiving and interacting with their environment.

tracks.name: Track 1: Robotics Hardware & Fundamentals
tracks.description: Learn robotics hardware, sensors, and electronic components

tracks.name: Track 2: Robot Programming & Navigation
tracks.description: Program robots for autonomous navigation and control

tracks.name: Track 3: AI for Robotics & Final Project
tracks.description: Integrate AI with robotics for intelligent behavior
topics: Final Project: Build an Autonomous Robot
